articles.title: No, the Freecash App Won’t Pay You to Scroll TikTok
articles.description: Freecash will actually pay money out to users but not for watching videos. This misleading marketing coincides with the app’s rising popularity.

articles.title: Toys "R" Us Canada closes another 19 stores in two months, leaving just 22 locations
articles.description: The national toy retailer, which once had 103 locations, has been rapidly shrinking its footprint in an apparent sign of struggle.

articles.title: Drimonis: Departing Legault delivers another blow to Montreal
articles.description: Amid labour shortages, the CAQ has chosen to extend its moratorium on low-wage temporary-foreign-worker permits in Montreal and Laval.

articles.title: 149 Million Usernames and Passwords Exposed by Unsecured Database
articles.description: This “dream wish list for criminals” includes millions of Gmail, Facebook, banking logins, and more. The researcher who discovered it suspects they were collected using infostealing malware.

articles.title: This one gene may explain most Alzheimer’s cases
articles.description: Alzheimer’s may be driven far more by genetics than previously thought, with one gene playing an outsized role.
